22 static cl::opt<bool> ViewBackground("view-background", cl::Hidden,
23  cl::desc("Execute graph viewer in the background. Creates tmp file litter."));
24 
25 std::string llvm::DOT::EscapeString(const std::string &Label) {
26  std::string Str(Label);
27  for (unsigned i = 0; i != Str.length(); ++i)
28  switch (Str[i]) {
29  case '\n':
30  Str.insert(Str.begin()+i, '\\'); // Escape character...
31  ++i;
32  Str[i] = 'n';
33  break;
34  case '\t':
35  Str.insert(Str.begin()+i, ' '); // Convert to two spaces
36  ++i;
37  Str[i] = ' ';
38  break;
39  case '\\':
40  if (i+1 != Str.length())
41  switch (Str[i+1]) {
42  case 'l': continue; // don't disturb \l
43  case '|': case '{': case '}':
44  Str.erase(Str.begin()+i); continue;
45  default: break;
46  }
47  case '{': case '}':
48  case '<': case '>':
49  case '|': case '"':
50  Str.insert(Str.begin()+i, '\\'); // Escape character...
51  ++i; // don't infinite loop
52  break;
53  }
54  return Str;
55 }
56 
57 /// \brief Get a color string for this node number. Simply round-robin selects
58 /// from a reasonable number of colors.
59 StringRef llvm::DOT::getColorString(unsigned ColorNumber) {
60  static const int NumColors = 20;
61  static const char* Colors[NumColors] = {
62  "aaaaaa", "aa0000", "00aa00", "aa5500", "0055ff", "aa00aa", "00aaaa",
63  "555555", "ff5555", "55ff55", "ffff55", "5555ff", "ff55ff", "55ffff",
64  "ffaaaa", "aaffaa", "ffffaa", "aaaaff", "ffaaff", "aaffff"};
65  return Colors[ColorNumber % NumColors];
66 }
67 
68 std::string llvm::createGraphFilename(const Twine &Name, int &FD) {
69  FD = -1;
70  SmallString<128> Filename;
71  std::error_code EC = sys::fs::createTemporaryFile(Name, "dot", FD, Filename);
72  if (EC) {
73  errs() << "Error: " << EC.message() << "\n";
74  return "";
75  }
76 
77  errs() << "Writing '" << Filename << "'... ";
78  return Filename.str();
79 }
80 
81 // Execute the graph viewer. Return true if there were errors.
82 static bool ExecGraphViewer(StringRef ExecPath, std::vector<const char *> &args,
83  StringRef Filename, bool wait,
84  std::string &ErrMsg) {
85  assert(args.back() == nullptr);
86  if (wait) {
87  if (sys::ExecuteAndWait(ExecPath, args.data(), nullptr, nullptr, 0, 0,
88  &ErrMsg)) {
89  errs() << "Error: " << ErrMsg << "\n";
90  return true;
91  }
92  sys::fs::remove(Filename);
93  errs() << " done. \n";
94  } else {
95  sys::ExecuteNoWait(ExecPath, args.data(), nullptr, nullptr, 0, &ErrMsg);
96  errs() << "Remember to erase graph file: " << Filename.str() << "\n";
97  }
98  return false;
99 }
100 
101 struct GraphSession {
102  std::string LogBuffer;
103  bool TryFindProgram(StringRef Names, std::string &ProgramPath) {
104  raw_string_ostream Log(LogBuffer);
105  SmallVector<StringRef, 8> parts;
106  Names.split(parts, "|");
107  for (auto Name : parts) {
108  if (ErrorOr<std::string> P = sys::findProgramByName(Name)) {
109  ProgramPath = *P;
110  return true;
111  }
112  Log << " Tried '" << Name << "'\n";
113  }
114  return false;
115  }
116 };
117 
118 static const char *getProgramName(GraphProgram::Name program) {
119  switch (program) {
120  case GraphProgram::DOT:
121  return "dot";
122  case GraphProgram::FDP:
123  return "fdp";
124  case GraphProgram::NEATO:
125  return "neato";
126  case GraphProgram::TWOPI:
127  return "twopi";
128  case GraphProgram::CIRCO:
129  return "circo";
130  }
131  llvm_unreachable("bad kind");
132 }
133 
134 bool llvm::DisplayGraph(StringRef FilenameRef, bool wait,
135  GraphProgram::Name program) {
136  std::string Filename = FilenameRef;
137  wait &= !ViewBackground;
138  std::string ErrMsg;
139  std::string ViewerPath;
140  GraphSession S;
141 
142  // Graphviz
143  if (S.TryFindProgram("Graphviz", ViewerPath)) {
144  std::vector<const char *> args;
145  args.push_back(ViewerPath.c_str());
146  args.push_back(Filename.c_str());
147  args.push_back(nullptr);
148 
149  errs() << "Running 'Graphviz' program... ";
150  return ExecGraphViewer(ViewerPath, args, Filename, wait, ErrMsg);
151  }
152 
153  // xdot
154  if (S.TryFindProgram("xdot|xdot.py", ViewerPath)) {
155  std::vector<const char *> args;
156  args.push_back(ViewerPath.c_str());
157  args.push_back(Filename.c_str());
158 
159  args.push_back("-f");
160  args.push_back(getProgramName(program));
161 
162  args.push_back(nullptr);
163 
164  errs() << "Running 'xdot.py' program... ";
165  return ExecGraphViewer(ViewerPath, args, Filename, wait, ErrMsg);
166  }
167 
168  enum PSViewerKind { PSV_None, PSV_OSXOpen, PSV_XDGOpen, PSV_Ghostview };
169  PSViewerKind PSViewer = PSV_None;
170 #ifdef __APPLE__
171  if (!PSViewer && S.TryFindProgram("open", ViewerPath))
172  PSViewer = PSV_OSXOpen;
173 #endif
174  if (!PSViewer && S.TryFindProgram("gv", ViewerPath))
175  PSViewer = PSV_Ghostview;
176  if (!PSViewer && S.TryFindProgram("xdg-open", ViewerPath))
177  PSViewer = PSV_XDGOpen;
178 
179  // PostScript graph generator + PostScript viewer
180  std::string GeneratorPath;
181  if (PSViewer &&
182  (S.TryFindProgram(getProgramName(program), GeneratorPath) ||
183  S.TryFindProgram("dot|fdp|neato|twopi|circo", GeneratorPath))) {
184  std::string PSFilename = Filename + ".ps";
185 
186  std::vector<const char *> args;
187  args.push_back(GeneratorPath.c_str());
188  args.push_back("-Tps");
189  args.push_back("-Nfontname=Courier");
190  args.push_back("-Gsize=7.5,10");
191  args.push_back(Filename.c_str());
192  args.push_back("-o");
193  args.push_back(PSFilename.c_str());
194  args.push_back(nullptr);
195 
196  errs() << "Running '" << GeneratorPath << "' program... ";
197 
198  if (ExecGraphViewer(GeneratorPath, args, Filename, wait, ErrMsg))
199  return true;
200 
201  args.clear();
202  args.push_back(ViewerPath.c_str());
203  switch (PSViewer) {
204  case PSV_OSXOpen:
205  args.push_back("-W");
206  args.push_back(PSFilename.c_str());
207  break;
208  case PSV_XDGOpen:
209  wait = false;
210  args.push_back(PSFilename.c_str());
211  break;
212  case PSV_Ghostview:
213  args.push_back("--spartan");
214  args.push_back(PSFilename.c_str());
215  break;
216  case PSV_None:
217  llvm_unreachable("Invalid viewer");
218  }
219  args.push_back(nullptr);
220 
221  ErrMsg.clear();
222  return ExecGraphViewer(ViewerPath, args, PSFilename, wait, ErrMsg);
223  }
224 
225  // dotty
226  if (S.TryFindProgram("dotty", ViewerPath)) {
227  std::vector<const char *> args;
228  args.push_back(ViewerPath.c_str());
229  args.push_back(Filename.c_str());
230  args.push_back(nullptr);
231 
232 // Dotty spawns another app and doesn't wait until it returns
233 #ifdef LLVM_ON_WIN32
234  wait = false;
235 #endif
236  errs() << "Running 'dotty' program... ";
237  return ExecGraphViewer(ViewerPath, args, Filename, wait, ErrMsg);
238  }
239 
240  errs() << "Error: Couldn't find a usable graph viewer program:\n";
241  errs() << S.LogBuffer << "\n";
242  return true;
243 }
